Max.name: Maximum Rendered Chat Messages
Max.hint: Number of chat messages displayed in the chat log at once.  Old messages are still there, and will be re-displayed if you scroll to the top.  They will be removed when the log is scolled back to the bottom.

Batch.name: Chat Rendering Batch Size
Batch.hint: Number of chat messages to render at once when scrolling up.  A smaller size means more 're-scrolls' when going back in the history.  But each re-scoll will be less of a pause.
